# **Win % in Emirates Stadium**

<br><br><br><br>

![](emirates_stadium_FTR_percent.jpg)

-   [Arsenal won a total of **68.42%** in their homeground showing a **strong dominance.**]{.underline}

-   [Away Teams won **21.05% of the total games played in emirates stadium**]{.underline}

-   [Draw results were a meagre **10.53%**]{.underline} <br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>

# **Distribution of Yellow Cards**

![](emirates_stadium_YC.jpeg)

-   Away team were given more yellow cards i.e. 35, hence **away teams commited more no of fouls**

-   Home teams were given **31 Yellow Cards**<br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>

# Distribution of Fouls

![](emirates_stadium_foulsshare.jpeg)

-   Away Teams commited **more Fouls(i.e. 52.39%)**

-   Home Teams commited **lesser Fouls(i.e. 47.61%)**

-   The findings can be correlated with the number of yellow card findings and a conclusion can be drawn that **fouls commited and yellow cards given have a positive and a direct relationship.**<br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>

# No Of Goals scored by Away Teams in Emirates Stadium

![](emirates_stadium_FTAG.jpg)

-   Five teams have scored two goals in emirates stadium i.e.(**Man City, Liverpool, Crystal Palace, Brighton, Chelsea)**

-   Seven teams have scored only one goal i.e. (**Wolves, Tottenham, Man United, Leeds, Everton, Brentford, Aston Villa)**

-   Rest Teams haven't been able to score in the Emirates Stadium<br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br><br>

# Shot Distribution in Emirates Stadium(Arsenal)

![](emirates_stadium_TCSH.jpg)

-   **347 Total Shots** have been taken by Arsenal

-   Out of which, **116 have been on target**

-   **196 i.e. majority of shots** have resulted in misses

-   **35 shots have resulted in goals**
